name: flow-view
description: is a visual editor for Dataflow programming

scripts.build: npm run cp; npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.cp: npm run cp_examples; npm run cp_package.json
scripts.gh-pages:push: git subtree --prefix gh-pages push origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages:pull: git subtree --prefix gh-pages pull origin gh-pages
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
flow: /empty.json
---" > gh-pages/index.md; cat README.md >> gh-pages/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.jekyll_serve: npm run browserify; npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd gh-pages; jekyll serve; cd ..
scripts.lint: for x in abstract components test; do npm run lint_$x; done
scripts.preversion: npm run build; npm run git_add-f
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run _push
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run gh-pages:pull
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run gh-pages:push
scripts.test: npm run test_components; npm run test_abstract
